item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Downtown at the Taft
Manager: Gratziano - 203-624-6331

Drink Specials:

Manager's Choice martinis - $5.00
House Wine - $5.00
Draft Beer - $4.00
Sangria - $5.00

Free appetizer buffet

Contact info: Robyn-Allise-203-823-5302

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***

PS: As some of you may be aware, Meetup charges for the hosting of a Meetup group, which runs about $70 for six months. We'll be bringing collection jar to this happy hour, and anything you can give towards defraying the cost of paying to keep the NHC going will be greatly appreciated!
item.name: Happy Hour - Downtown at the Taft
